About Us

Our website is currently an information service for UK outdoor adventures. We provide this information for free because we love the UK outdoors and we want to help people get out there.

We are soon to be a platform enabling people to link directly with the best guides, accommodation and travel providers in the UK.

If you're a user, let us recommend you some of the best stuff the UK has to offer. If you're a provider, get in touch - we'd love to work with you.

We would love to hear from you:

Email: hello@wilderness-now.com
Phone: +44 7925 193 365

Thanks, Charles

Charles Montier

I'm an outdoor guide with multiple expeditions in the Amazon, Himalayas and Andes. But my true passion is for guiding in the UK's wild places, which I truly believe are as beautiful, challenging and inspiring as anything else on the planet! Friends have asked me "Why is it so difficult for people who live in the city to do adventures in the UK?" Wilderness Now is on a mission to solve this!

Michael Bruce

I love to surf, to climb, to go trail running in the UK's amazing outdoors - I sit at my desk dreaming about this stuff! But I know it can be hard to find the best guides, accommodation and transport. It shouldn't have to be hard. If you want to get out there - whatever your sport, experience level, or budget - you're the reason we made Wilderness Now.

Wilderness Now

Wilderness Now is a link between you and the feeling of being fully alive. Choose your next UK adventure.

Wilderness Now links you to the UK's best adventures and guides. Choose an adventure, fill out our 30 second form, and we'll recommend you an amazing experience.
